title: Famine card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a gaunt figure crawling along an expanse of dry, cracked earth.}} The Famine card sets the player's current [[Nutrition|nutrition]] level to 500 (Starving). ==History== *The Famine card was removed, along with all need for [[nutrition]], in [[0.26]]. *The Famine card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] ![[0.18]] ![[0.19]] and beyond |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of oddities|Oddities]]
